feed.title: Bracket Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Bracket: v2.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: archived tournaments by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1112
  • Update pytest asyncio to 0.25.3 by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1110

Docs changes: * Add FAQ by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1098 * Docs: fix page description by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1101 * docs: update title by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1102 * Add image alts by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1106 * Add robots.txt by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1107 * Add usage to readme by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1111 * Add alts to images in home carousel by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1103 * fix long line in docusaurus.config.js by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1104 * Update description in index.js by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1105 * Add usage guide and terminology page by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1108

Other changes: * Update node to 22 by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1092 * Update node to 22 in frontend.yml by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1093 * Update node to 22 in docs_test.yml by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1094 * Update node to 22 in docs_publish.yml by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1095 * New Crowdin updates by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1096

Dependabot bumps: * Bump docker/build-push-action from 6.12.0 to 6.13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1089 * Bump @types/node from 22.12.0 to 22.13.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1097 * Bump markdownlint-rule-relative-links from 3.0.0 to 4.0.1 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1068 * Update mypy requirement from 1.14.1 to 1.15.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1099

Full Changelog: https://github.com/evroon/bracket/compare/v2.0.3...v2.1.0

entry.title: New release for Bracket: v2.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

This release introduces ARM64 builds for the bracket-frontend docker image.

  • New Crowdin updates by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1113
  • Enable trailingSlash in docs by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1114
  • Add teams with players by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1118
  • New Crowdin updates by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1119
  • Enable multi arch frontend images and update ubuntu to 24.04 on CI by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1120

Dependabot: * Bump @tabler/icons-react from 3.29.0 to 3.30.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1115 * Bump prettier from 3.4.1 to 3.5.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1116 * Bump @hello-pangea/dnd from 17.0.0 to 18.0.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1117

Full Changelog: https://github.com/evroon/bracket/compare/v2.1.0...v2.2.0

entry.title: New release for Bracket: v2.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Filter empty player names out of multi team creation by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1122
  • Fix number of elimination teams by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1123
  • Add tests for conflict logic by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1124
  • Add tests for swiss rescheduling by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1125
  • Add more integration tests by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1126
  • Fix sorting of matches on dashboard by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1129
  • Fix backend dependencies by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1131
  • Use Nextra for docs by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1140
  • Docs fixes by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1141
  • fix logo url in README.md by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1142
  • Add favicon to docs by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1146
  • fix image urls in readme by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1149
  • Fix healthcheck commands by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1151

Dependabot

  • Bump serialize-javascript from 6.0.1 to 6.0.2 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1121
  • Bump @mantine/form from 7.16.0 to 7.17.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1127
  • Bump react-icons from 5.4.0 to 5.5.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1128
  • Bump next from 15.1.2 to 15.2.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1132
  • Bump @hcaptcha/react-hcaptcha from 1.11.0 to 1.12.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1133
  • Bump @next/eslint-plugin-next from 15.1.0 to 15.2.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1134
  • Bump @next/bundle-analyzer from 15.1.0 to 15.2.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1135
  • Bump axios from 1.7.4 to 1.8.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1136
  • Bump babel-loader from 9.1.3 to 10.0.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1138
  • Bump babel-loader from 9.2.1 to 10.0.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1139
  • Bump eslint from 8.57.1 to 9.21.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1143
  • Bump typescript from 5.7.2 to 5.8.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1144
  • Bump @tabler/icons-react from 3.30.0 to 3.31.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1147
  • Update bcrypt requirement from 4.2.1 to 4.3.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1137
  • Update alembic requirement from 1.14.1 to 1.15.1 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1148

Full Changelog: https://github.com/evroon/bracket/compare/v2.2.0...v2.2.1

entry.title: New release for Bracket: v2.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix backend healthcheck address by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1171
  • fix sed error by @nvanheuverzwijn in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1173
  • add missing locale by @nvanheuverzwijn in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1178

Dependabot

  • Update ruff requirement from 0.9.1 to 0.11.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1155
  • Bump axios from 1.8.1 to 1.8.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1156
  • Bump @babel/runtime from 7.26.7 to 7.26.10 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1157
  • Update sentry-sdk requirement from 2.22.0 to 2.23.1 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1158
  • Update fastapi-sso requirement from 0.17.0 to 0.18.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1160
  • Bump next from 15.2.0 to 15.2.3 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1161
  • Bump next from 15.2.0 to 15.2.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1162
  • Update sentry-sdk requirement from 2.23.1 to 2.24.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1164
  • Bump ts-jest from 29.2.0 to 29.3.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1165
  • Update python-dotenv requirement from 1.0.1 to 1.1.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1166
  • Update pytest-asyncio requirement from 0.25.3 to 0.26.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1167
  • Bump tailwind-merge from 2.6.0 to 3.1.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1169
  • Update sentry-sdk requirement from 2.24.0 to 2.25.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1170
  • Update pydantic requirement from 2.10.6 to 2.11.1 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1168
  • Update pytest-cov requirement from 6.0.0 to 6.1.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1172
  • Bump next from 15.2.3 to 15.2.4 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1174
  • Bump next from 15.2.3 to 15.2.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1175
  • Bump @types/node from 22.13.0 to 22.14.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1176
  • Bump @testing-library/react from 16.2.0 to 16.3.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1177

Crowdin

  • New Crowdin updates by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1180
  • New Crowdin updates by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1181

New Contributors

  • @nvanheuverzwijn made their first contribution in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/evroon/bracket/compare/v2.2.1...v2.2.2

entry.title: New release for Bracket: v2.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Delete .github/workflows/stale.yml by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1194
  • Fix Deployment link in docs footer by @MaxRickettsUy in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1203
  • Add member names to teams table by @jmillxyz in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1201
  • Fix svg logo by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1213
  • Fix link to config docs from deployment page by @MaxRickettsUy in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1219
  • Fix process compose docs cmd and broken link by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1220
  • Use icons for selecting stage items by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1221
  • Link to README for contributers by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1225
  • Remove job from GH action contributors.yml by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1226
  • Fix title on docs homepage by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1230
  • Add GH trending badge to README.md by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1231

Automated changes

  • Bump @next/eslint-plugin-next from 15.2.0 to 15.3.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1185
  • Bump @next/bundle-analyzer from 15.2.0 to 15.3.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1186
  • Bump next from 15.2.4 to 15.3.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1187
  • Update sentry-sdk requirement from 2.25.0 to 2.26.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1189
  • Bump i18next from 24.2.0 to 25.0.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1190
  • Bump react-i18next from 15.4.0 to 15.5.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1193
  • Update sentry-sdk requirement from 2.26.0 to 2.27.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1195
  • Bump @types/node from 22.14.0 to 22.15.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1196
  • Bump axios from 1.8.2 to 1.9.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1197
  • Bump @babel/core from 7.26.0 to 7.27.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1199
  • Bump @mantine/form from 7.17.0 to 8.0.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1204
  • Bump i18next from 25.0.0 to 25.1.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1206
  • Update click requirement from 8.1.8 to 8.2.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1224
  • Update sentry-sdk requirement from 2.27.0 to 2.28.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1228
  • Bump eslint-plugin-testing-library from 7.1.0 to 7.2.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1234
  • Update contributors in readme by @github-actions in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1211

  • Update contributors in readme by @github-actions in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1182

  • New Crowdin updates by @evroon in https://github.com/evroon/bracket/pull/1236
